results.message: This async method lacks 'await' operators and will run synchronously. Consider using the 'await' operator to await non-blocking API calls, or 'await Task.Run(...)' to do CPU-bound work on a background thread.

Complete the task associated to this 'TODO' comment.
Remove this commented out code.
Remove this commented out code.
Remove this commented out code.
Remove this unread private field '_logger' or refactor the code to use its value.
Remove this unread private field '_config' or refactor the code to use its value.
Remove the unnecessary Boolean literal(s).
Drop 'Where' and move the condition into the 'First'.
Change this condition so that it does not always evaluate to 'false'; some subsequent code is never executed.
Make sure this debug feature is deactivated before delivering the code in production.

CS1998.shortDescription: Async method lacks 'await' operators and will run synchronously

CS8602.shortDescription: Dereference of a possibly null reference.

CS8629.shortDescription: Nullable value type may be null.

S1125.shortDescription: Boolean literals should not be redundant
S1125.fullDescription: Redundant Boolean literals should be removed from expressions to improve readability.

S1135.fullDescription: TODO tags are commonly used to mark places where some more code is required, but which the developer wants to implement later.

S125.shortDescription: Sections of code should not be commented out
S125.fullDescription: Programmers should not comment out code as it bloats programs and reduces readability.

S2583.shortDescription: Conditionally executed code should be reachable
S2583.fullDescription: Conditional expressions which are always true or false can lead to dead code. Such code is always buggy and should never be used in production.

S2971.fullDescription: In the interests of readability, code that can be simplified should be simplified. To that end, there are several ways IEnumerable language integrated queries (LINQ) can be simplified

S4487.fullDescription: Private fields only used to store values without reading them later is a case of dead store. So changing the value of such field is useless and most probably indicates a serious error in the code.

S4507.shortDescription: Delivering code in production with debug features activated is security-sensitive
S4507.fullDescription: Delivering code in production with debug features activated is security-sensitive. It has led in the past to the following vulnerabilities:
